response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value and potential impact on your business, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $1,500,000, tailored to meet your specific needs at a highly competitive rate. We are confident that this investment will prove to be highly profitable for you. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 1200000}
